speaker: Nathan
text: I agreed to give a presentation on AI trends next month. Would you consider joining me as a co-speaker?
ipa: aɪ əˈɡɹid tə ɡɪv ə ˌpɹɛzənˈteɪʃən ɑn ˌeɪˈaɪ tɹɛndz nɛkst mʌnθ | wʊd jʊ kənˈsɪdɚ ˈʤɔɪnɪŋ mi æz ə koʊˈspiːkɚ
stress: I AGREED to GIVE a PRESENTATION on AI TRENDS NEXT MONTH | Would YOU CONSIDER JOINING ME as a CO-SPEAKER
linking:
"agreed to" → /əˈɡɹid tə/ (d + t linking)
"presentation on" → /ˌpɹɛzənˈteɪʃən ɑn/ (n + o linking)

speaker: Chloe
text: I'd love to! Actually, I prefer sharing the stage with someone — it's less stressful.
ipa: aɪd lʌv tu | ˈækʧuəli | aɪ pɹəˈfɝ ˈʃɛɹɪŋ ðə steɪʤ wɪð ˈsʌmwʌn | ɪts lɛs ˈstɹɛsfəl
stress: I'd LOVE to! ACTUALLY, I PREFER SHARING the STAGE with SOMEONE — it's LESS STRESSFUL
linking:
"prefer sharing" → /pɹəˈfɝ ˈʃɛɹɪŋ/ (r + sh linking)
"stage with" → /steɪʤ wɪð/ (g + w linking)

speaker: Nathan
text: Exactly! I also intend to start working on the slides this week. Maybe we could carry on brainstorming some ideas together?
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | aɪ ˈɔlsoʊ ɪnˈtɛnd tə stɑɹt ˈwɝkɪŋ ɑn ðə slaɪdz ðɪs wik | ˈmeɪbi wi kʊd ˈkæɹi ɑn ˈbɹeɪnˌstɔɹmɪŋ səm aɪˈdiəz təˈɡɛðɚ
stress: EXACTLY! I ALSO INTEND to START WORKING on the SLIDES this WEEK | Maybe we could CARRY ON BRAINSTORMING some IDEAS TOGETHER
linking:
"intend to" → /ɪnˈtɛnd tə/ (d + t linking)
"carry on" → /ˈkæɹi ɑn/ (y + o linking)

speaker: Chloe
text: Sure. I'm thinking about suggesting adding a live demo too. What do you think?
ipa: ʃʊɹ | aɪm ˈθɪŋkɪŋ əˈbaʊt səˈʤɛstɪŋ ˈædɪŋ ə laɪv ˈdɛmoʊ tu | wʌt du jʊ θɪŋk
stress: SURE. I'm THINKING about SUGGESTING ADDING a LIVE DEMO too | What do YOU THINK
linking:
"thinking about" → /ˈθɪŋkɪŋ əˈbaʊt/ (ng + a linking)
"adding a" → /ˈædɪŋ ə/ (ng + a linking)

speaker: Nathan
text: That's a great idea. I attempted doing a live coding session once — it went well. We just need to plan it very carefully.
ipa: ðæts ə ɡɹeɪt aɪˈdiə | aɪ əˈtɛmptɪd ˈduɪŋ ə laɪv ˈkoʊdɪŋ ˈsɛʃən wʌns — ɪt wɛnt wɛl | wi ʤəst nid tə plæn ɪt ˈvɛɹi ˈkɛɹfəli
stress: That's a GREAT IDEA | I ATTEMPTED DOING a LIVE CODING SESSION once — it WENT WELL | We just NEED to PLAN it VERY CAREFULLY
linking:
"attempted doing" → /əˈtɛmptɪd ˈduɪŋ/ (d + d linking)
"plan it" → /plæn ɪt/ (n + i linking)

speaker: Chloe
text: Absolutely. We shouldn't risk failing because of technical issues. Maybe we ought to check the venue setup in advance.
ipa: ˌæbsəˈlutli | wi ˈʃʊdənt ɹɪsk ˈfeɪlɪŋ bɪˈkəz əv ˈtɛknɪkəl ˈɪʃuz | ˈmeɪbi wi ɔt tə ʧɛk ðə ˈvɛnju ˈsɛtʌp ɪn ədˈvæns
stress: ABSOLUTELY | We SHOULDN'T RISK FAILING because of TECHNICAL ISSUES | Maybe we OUGHT to CHECK the VENUE SETUP in ADVANCE
linking:
"risk failing" → /ɹɪsk ˈfeɪlɪŋ/ (k + f linking)
"check the" → /ʧɛk ðə/ (k + th linking)

speaker: Nathan
text: Good point. I don't mind arriving early on the day to test everything.
ipa: ɡʊd pɔɪnt | aɪ doʊnt maɪnd əˈɹaɪvɪŋ ˈɜɹli ɑn ðə deɪ tə tɛst ˈɛvɹiθɪŋ
stress: GOOD POINT | I DON'T MIND ARRIVING EARLY on the DAY to TEST EVERYTHING
linking:
"don't mind" → /doʊnt maɪnd/ (t + m linking)
"arriving early" → /əˈɹaɪvɪŋ ˈɜɹli/ (ng + e linking)

speaker: Chloe
text: Neither do I. Also, remember to confirm the final schedule with the organizers. We can't afford forgetting anything important!
ipa: ˈniðɚ du aɪ | ˈɔlsoʊ | ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ tə kənˈfɝm ðə ˈfaɪnəl ˈskɛʤuəl wɪð ði ˈɔɹɡəˌnaɪzɚz | wi kænt əˈfɔɹd fɚˈɡɛtɪŋ ˈɛniθɪŋ ɪmˈpɔɹtənt
stress: NEITHER DO I | ALSO, REMEMBER to CONFIRM the FINAL SCHEDULE with the ORGANIZERS | We CAN'T AFFORD FORGETTING ANYTHING IMPORTANT
linking:
"remember to" → /ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ tə/ (r + t linking)
"can't afford" → /kænt əˈfɔɹd/ (t + a linking)
